data.title: Pikes Peak State College
data.text:
Main Campus: Home to the Divisions of Business, Technology and Public Service (BTPS) and Technical and Professional Studies (TPS)

Almost every course is offered at the Centennial Campus, but many of the technical degrees are only offered here. E.g. Welding, Auto-Tech and Culinary Arts.

Pikes Peak State College, Centennial Campus

5675 South Academy Boulevard

Colorado Springs, CO 80906

Most of the general education courses are offered at the Downtown Campus, the emphasis is arts and creative fields. E.g. Dance, Theatre, Music, Art, and many Multi-media and Graphic Design. Home of the Division of Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences (AHSS).

Studio West, an annex to the Downtown Campus for Theatre, Dance, and the Studio West Art Gallery, is West of the campus.

Pikes Peak State College Downtown Campus

100 West Pikes Peak Avenue

Colorado Springs, CO 80903

Our simulation rooms contain state-of-the-art technologies to simulate the experience of the field. The simulation center staff is highly trained and staffed with standardized patients to help enrich and enhance the learning experience. Home to the Division of Health Sciences (HS).

Center for Healthcare Education & Simulation (CHES)

1850 Cypress Semi Drive

Colorado Springs, CO 80921
